nodes.text: Chief Administrator was the title used by Nien Nunb when he controlled the Spice Mines of Kessel.
In the Galactic Empire, it was the title used by the first assistant of Moffs ands governors. Until 0 ABY, Vilim Disra was the Chief Administrator of Shelsha sector, under Governor Barshnis Choard.
The leader of the planet 244Core held the title "Chief Administrator," and individuals were elected to the position by the world's Corporate Committee.
